sourcesContent:
Create Workout





Created Workouts:

  • {{workout.sets}} sets of {{workout.repetitions}} reps at {{workout.weight}} kg ({{workout.setType}})
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-workout', templateUrl: './create-workout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-workout.component.css'] }) export class CreateWorkoutComponent { sets = 0; repetitions = 0; weight = 0; setType = 'warmup'; workouts: any[] = []; onSubmit() { const newWorkout = { sets: this.sets, repetitions: this.repetitions, weight: this.weight, setType: this.setType, }; this.workouts.push(newWorkout); this.sets = 0; this.repetitions = 0; this.weight = 0; this.setType = 'warmup'; } }
